file_content.text: You've been an inspiration. I won't let the Killiks threaten Organa's borders again.
The Killiks are running for their hives.
Thank you. I--I never thought I'd see the day.
We still have a long battle before us, but there's hope now.
Take care.
I appreciate that. We'll do our best.
Enjoy the fight.
We'll manage fine on our own.
Time to win your own battles.
Don't worry. You've done enough already.
Some day, Organa will rule all of Alderaan. I won't give up on that dream.
Sergeant Dolin Organa, sir. Please stay. Morale's tanking, and our situation, well it's only getting worse.
Oh thank you, I'm saved! I'm Sergeant Dolin Organa. Stay, stay. We have a situation here.
Stick around, spacer. I'm Sergeant Dolin Organa. Can't tell you how much we need offworld talent like yours.
I'm Sergeant Dolin Organa. Please stay. Resources are stretched thin, and I could use another gun out there.
I'm gathering weapons for our fight against the Killiks. Whatever I find won't hold them off long, though. Not with so many of those bugs.
Giving up now only hastens your defeat.
Don't despair.
I know, but we won't last much longer. The river's the only thing stopping the Killiks.
What are Killiks?
Killiks?
They're a hive species, insects really. Been swallowing up more Organa land every day. The river's the only thing slowing their advance.
Once they tunnel under that, they'll overrun everything, including this outpost.
If you want my help, say so.
The Killiks will overrun everything once they tunnel under the river.
We need to thin out the Killik herd. They're a hive mind. Do enough damage to the whole and they'll turn back.
I won't let this infestation harm your people.
I'll defend Organa.
I'll end this Killik disruption. Organa has nothing to fear.
Balance will be restored.
Maybe there's hope for us after all.
I'll exterminate the whole nest. Just tell me where to aim.
Blast a few bugs? No problem.
Thank you, sir. I remember when I had your spirit.
If you're too squeamish, I'll smash the pests for you.
Squashing bugs? No problem.
Thank you. We have the stomach for the job, but not the training.
If you can stop the Killiks, Organa might stand a chance.
I won't. [Refuse quest]
You're probably right. No matter what we do, the Killiks will win.
Best stock up while you can. Won't be long before the Killiks take over.
Fine. Where are these pests?
The Killiks are across the river. Please push the insects back, stop them from absorbing more Organa territory.
My lord, I'm--I'm honored! Sergeant Dolin Organa reporting. Please stay. Our situation's worsening.
You're lucky I'm bored.
